name: T-Shirt
description: Comfortable 100% cotton t-shirt in various colors. Perfect for everyday wear with a relaxed fit and soft fabric.

name: Denim Jeans
description: Premium denim jeans with perfect fit and durability. Modern style that goes well with any casual outfit.

name: Winter Jacket
description: Warm winter jacket with water-resistant outer shell and cozy insulation. Stay comfortable in cold weather conditions.

name: Running Shoes
description: Lightweight running shoes with cushioned soles and breathable mesh. Designed for comfort and performance on any terrain.

name: Summer Dress
description: Flowy summer dress in vibrant patterns. Perfect for warm days with its breathable fabric and stylish design.
